mil7.5.9:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘varāhassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.5.9:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, varāho santattakaṭhite gimhasamaye sampatte udakaṃ upagacchati;
mil7.5.9:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena dosena citte āluḷitakhalitavibbhantasantatte sītalāmatapaṇītamettābhāvanaṃ upagantabbaṃ.
mil7.5.9:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, varāhassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.5.9:2.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, varāho cikkhallamudakamupagantvā nāsikāya pathaviṃ khaṇitvā doṇiṃ katvā doṇikāya sayati;
mil7.5.9:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena mānase kāyaṃ nikkhipitvā ārammaṇantaragatena sayitabbaṃ.
mil7.5.9:2.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, varāhassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
